headline: Cannellini Bean Caprese Salad
name: Cannellini Bean Caprese Salad
description: This cannellini bean salad is the best of both bean salad and caprese salad, fresh and delicious, and the perfect accompaniment to grilled chicken or fish.
recipeIngredient: 1 (15.5-ounce) can cannellini beans, rinsed and drained
salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1/4 cup balsamic glaze, or as needed

recipeInstructions.text: Place beans, tomatoes, mozzarella balls, basil, and olive oil in a large bowl. Toss to coat; season with salt and pepper.
When ready to serve, divide salad onto plates and drizzle with balsamic glaze, about 1 tablespoon per serving.
